feed.title: Obtainium Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.0.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add F-droid badge to README.md by @inson1 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1371
  • Update hu.json by @gidano in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1368
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1408:
    • Improved URL handling for F-Droid third party repos (#1399)
    • Fixed F-Droid repo search (#1400) + general search bugfixes
    • Improved APK filter for F-Droid (#1386)
    • Don't remove storage permission (#1391)
    • Jump in versionCode to fix updates in x86 versions (#1370)

New Contributors

  • @inson1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1371

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.0.2...v1.0.3

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.0.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update README.md by @DwainZwerg in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1413
  • Update vi.json by @ngocanhtve in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1415
  • Solve issues with gitlab .apk files and cloudflare protection by @akramer-zibra in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1411
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1439:
  • Allow any source to be overridden (#1420)
  • Bugfix for installing apps with ID change step (#1424)
  • Bugfix: 'null' changelog for some track-only apps (#1425)
  • Show latest APK name/count on app page (#1426)
  • More BG update interval options (#1431)

New Contributors

  • @akramer-zibra made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1411

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.0.3...v1.0.4

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.0.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix bug in GitHub's 'verify latest' option (#1449) by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1461
  • Improve gitlab .apk retrieval (#1450, #1381, #1380) by @akramer-zibra in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1459
  • add ukrainian by @dik08razz in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1448
  • Update Chinese translation by @LilligantMatsuri in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1445
  • Fix 'F-Droid' translation' in fr.json by @rollsicecream in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1444
  • Update hu.json by @gidano in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1442
  • Removed outdated translations related to #1459 by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1462

New Contributors

  • @dik08razz made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1448
  • @rollsicecream made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1444

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.0.4...v1.0.5

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.0.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update uk.json by @dik08razz in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1464
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1478:
    • Resume failed downloads when possible instead of starting again (#634)
    • Typo: 'Installed' not 'Updated' (#1469) + Bugfix: Don't incorrectly show message when user cancel
    • Add changelog button to app page (#1474)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.0.5...v1.0.6

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.0
entry.content:
Note

This version removes SourceForge. - For details on why this was done, see: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/issues/1479#issuecomment-2005689934 - Any existing SourceForge app will switch to using the 'HTML' Source but will no longer work until you make significant changes to its configuration. - For an example of what such changes look like, click this link on a device with Obtainium installed - it imports a SourceForge app added through the HTML Source (Open Camera).

What's Changed

  • Fixes to Spanish translation by @fitojb in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1486
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1502
  • Added 'Share new Apps with AppVerifier' (#255)
  • Removed SourceForge (#1487)
  • Delete downloaded APK on install fail (#1495)
  • Fix GitLab's broken track-only mode (#1496)
  • Auto-delete download if likely invalid (#1498)

New Contributors

  • @fitojb made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1486

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.0.6...v1.1.0
